features: [DIMMABLE FLOOR LAMP FOR BRIGHTNESS & COLOR] This tall lamp can use the remote control to adjust the brightness by stepless from 10% to 100% and color temperature from 3000K to 6000K, for warm white, natural white, and cool white light. You can easily change the color temperature and brightness by the remote control to set the overall ambiance of the room. Different Modes creates a different atmosphere to meet your daily needs.

[CORNER FLOOR LAMP WITH REMOTE CONTROL & FOOT SWITCH] This 66'' pole lamp adopts a combination remote control & foot switch, assuring convenience for daily life. The 9W bulb is paired with the remote control, then you only need to select the appropriate color temperature and brightness suiting your needs.(Please adjust the foot switch into ON in advance.) Suitable for placing this minimalist floor lamp in the corner behind the sectional or beside bed.

[BEDROOM FLOOR LAMPS WITH 1H TIMER & MAGNET ADSORPTION FUCTION]: This tall floor lamp uses one hour timing setting function make you and your baby fall in sleep easily which do not need to control. The remote control is magnetic, so it is super easy to stick on a metal surface and always know where it is. We suggest you put the remote on the pole of the floor light so that keep you from losing it.

[IDEAL AND PERFECT GIFT FOR NEW HOUSE] Skinny and elegant design of this standing floor lamp can make it easy to place in any room of the house and fit in any room from industrial to modern or traditional décor. Especially when you are moving to a new house that doesn't have ceiling lights in many of the rooms, this dimming floor lamp is a great addition to any room in the house.

[EASY INSTALLATION] Easy to put together and included the light bulb. You need to twist the poles together, insert them in the base. The lampshade comes rolled up and you wrap it around the wire frame and close the velcro in the back. No need any tools to complete. Perfect for a living room floor lamp, bedroom floor lamp, kids room floor lamp, office floor lamp, appartment floor lamp, classroom floor lamp.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Previous page Next page 1 LIVING ROOM LAMP 2 BEDROOM FLOOR LAMP 3 OFFICE FLOOR LAMP

Why Do We Choose Ambimall Remote Control Modern Floor Lamp? Have you ever had these problems: 1-Can't find switch when surroundings are dark? 2-Unable to find slippers when get up in night? 3-No willingness to sleep because of over bright light? If you want to make your bedroom or living room more cozy, Ambimall floor lamp can satisfy you. It is a very multifunctional floor lamp which can afford a lot of light in a tight corner. You can place this floor lamp in your bedroom or living room corner,it is tall and thin so it can give the light you need but doesn't take up a lot of space. Stepless dimmable floor lamp with different color temperature and brightness modes. If you have different lighting needs for your bedrooms, study rooms or living rooms, Ambimall floor lamp is an appropriate choice. Because this standing lamp provide a 9W LED bulb(3000K/4000K/5000K/6000K & 30%-100% brightness).

Stepless Color Temperature 3000K Warm Light can create a warm and peaceful atmosphere, perfect for sleeping, relaxing and baby nursing at night. 4000K Natural Light perfect for playing phone or watching TV. 5000K-6000K Daylight is the best choice for reading and working. Stepless Brightness Adjustable The brightness can be adjusted from 30% to 100%, and you can always adjust the brightness which suits your need. You can position this tall floor lamp for your bedroom to replace a table lamp by the bed, freeing up space on the bedside table. Floor Lamps for Living Room Clearance Especially you place the floor lamp in your living room behind the couch due to the remote control feature, the tall lamp comes in handy when you're lazy and don't want to get up. Not harsh lighting, great for reading.

66'' Floor Lamp with Remote The floor lamp is remote controlled, and it has different levels of brightness, and different color settings for the lighting. This floor lamp also contain a foot switch to turn on/off but can not adjust the color temperature and brightness. The floor light has a memory function to remember your last brightness and color temperature when you turn the lamp back on. Packing list The lampshade and bulb are included so that you no need to buy them seperatly. (Our lamp can be used most kinds of E26 base bulbs if you want to change a bulb. We suggest the maximum watts of bulb is 60W.) Easy installation of lamp floor Assembly takes about 10 minutes. Make sure not to cross-thread the pole when putting it together. The lamp shade is held together by Velcro. It is easy to assemble.

1 Hour Timer & Magnetic Absorption Function Our floor lamp has an 1-hour timer function which is suitable for using before sleep, press the 1-hour timer before sleep, no need to worry about forgetting to turn off the light and you can sleep peacefully. In addition, the remote control can be attached to the light pole, so you won’t worry about losing it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars EASY ASSEMBLE SLEEK RESULT
reviews.reviewText: So easy to assemble, I truly appreciate that. The light has great ambiance levels that I can switch to fit the mood I'm in. The brightest setting is super for when you're cleaning floors and the like. Having a remote is also good because I don't have to get up. Lol.So great, I bought two, one for living room and one for bedroom.Price is very reasonable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just what I needed!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I’ve been searching everywhere for a floor lamp and finally landed on this one. I love it! The way you can dim the light and it has multiple light shading settings. Super sleek looking and sturdy. Love that the remote is magnetic to the lamp. I already ordered a second one for the other side!! Definitely worth the price

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars And then there was light…
reviews.reviewText: This is just what we needed in our room! It’s perfect and super easy to put together! Super cute too! I love the several light options. If you’re thinking about getting it, do it! 5 stars!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Bright, sleek, fits anywhere
reviews.reviewText: It looks great takes up little space, gives plenty of light. Assembly was easy for the most part, except for the shade. Once I read another review that said that the shade is rolled backwards I was all set. I appreciate the reviewer mentioning that. Very happy with it, and may get another one for another room.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great price given the options it has.
reviews.reviewText: I love the flexibility of brightness and type of lighting, as well as the remote control. Easy to assemble.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Good light but careful with the shade
reviews.reviewText: The brightness, remote customization, and quality are all great EXCEPT the connecting points between the shade and the metal ring are really weak. I ordered two different lamps for my room and the connectors to attach the shade to the lamp broke on BOTH within a week or so of just sitting there :/ going to try superglue I guess

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best All Around Floor Lamp
reviews.reviewText: It's skinny. It's tall. It illuminates. It dims. From warm "incandescent" light (what I wanted) to cool white (no thank you). I bought two "A: white" floor lamps and may buy more because they are so versatile! Using one at lowest setting to add a touch of light in a dark corner of the dining room and using another at medium brightness for bedside reading (see attached pictures). When turned up to brightest setting, it will light up a good bit of the room (not pictured). It fits in a narrow space, is modern-looking, and puts out warm, dimmable light = perfect. TIP: If it doesn't light up the first time you turn it on, and after you've plugged it in, installed the bulb, and installed the batteries into the remote, you may need to step on the foot switch, first. ; ) Don't ask me how I know. Enjoy!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great product. Does a great job. Easy to use and assemble and looks great.
